mapper.select: select sql_calc_found_rows (@ranking := @ranking + 1) as `rank`, r.* from (select u.uid, u.username, u.nickname, u.has_avatar, committed, passed, truncate(score, 2) as score from leaderboard l join user u on l.deleted = false and l.uid = u.uid where u.role = 1 and score > 0 order by score desc, update_time) r, (select @ranking := #{start}) rn limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows();

select sql_calc_found_rows (@ranking := @ranking + 1) as `rank`, r.* from (select u.uid, u.username, u.nickname, u.has_avatar, committed, passed, truncate(score, 2) as score from leaderboard_contest lc join user u on lc.deleted = false and lc.uid = u.uid where contest_id = #{contestId} and u.role = 1 and score > 0 order by score desc, update_time) r, (select @ranking := #{start}) rn limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows();
